Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: Green tea helps with bloating, and will make you pee. But the only thing it's going to do to help promote weightless is the slight amount of caffeine In it. Some people swear by it's appetite suppression but I'm not sure how much I believe that.   Don't get me wrong though! I love green tea and it does have properties that help support a healthy life. But is it some miracle substance? No.

Author: coconutfi
Text: I don’t think you can lose a significant amount of fat from drinking a lot of green tea, but it can reduce bloating and get rid of extra water weight.  I didn’t believe it because I’ve never been able to reduce bloating so quickly (I was going out with friends that night).  I drank 4-5 cups of green tea throughout the day and the bloat was gone!  Blew my mind.
